items.sentence: How old were you when your family moved to Boston?
I am not sure, but I think I want to be a teacher.
Something like that wouldn\'t happen in Australia.
Sooner or later, Tom will likely agree to help us.
Tom and Mary are both in Boston now, aren\'t they?
Tom wasn\'t given the chance you and I were given.
Tom wasn\'t sure whether he should do that or not.
Tom wasn\'t the one who convinced Mary to do that.
Tom couldn\'t get Mary to tell him what was wrong.
Tom didn\'t tell anyone why he had gone to Boston.
Tom has had his leg in a cast for a few weeks now.
Tom has never had to work hard in his entire life.
Tom helps Mary with her homework almost every day.
Tom is a janitor at the school where Mary teaches.
Tom served two months in jail for drunken driving.
Tom should be out of surgery in about three hours.
I want to thank you for what you\'ve done for Tom.
I wanted Tom to forgive Mary for what she\'d done.
I\'ve told you again and again to be more careful.
If I have enough time tomorrow, I\'ll go shopping.
